title: Blood Moon yasuo skin
body:
I have heard about the new yasuo skin wich is called blood moon yasuo, finally after along time we will get a new yasuo skin. However, after seeing the skin its looks really amazing and all and it costs 975 on PBE, i feel like it more new particle effects could be added and the skin could be so much better and we will propably not get another yasuo skin in the next days, i suggest that the skin could be alot better with some more particle effects on his first 2 q's and on his e q combo, it will be perfect.
Then it could easly be worth 1350.

replies.body:
Hey Korean Wannabe 7! 

First off, thanks for the feedback! We don't have plans to add additional particles to Blood Moon Yasuo.

I got here with the Red Tracker :p
I'm currently ~~spamming~~ learning Yasuo.
And I'll make sure to save some RP to buy his bloodmoon skin :P
I think you did an amazing job on those bloodmoon skins, and I'm personally in love with Yasuo and Kennen's masks :3
{{summoner:31}}
Thanks for the kind words! Glad you're a fan of him! I'm a huge fan of Kennen - he looks so badass with his mask. ^-^
